events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event emitted for setting the modelValue

props.name: collapseOnItemClick
props.description: Determines if the sidebar should close when clicking a sidebar item

props.name: collapseOnClickOutside
props.description: Determines if the sidebar should close when clicking outside, on the overlay

props.name: collapsePosition
props.description: The collapse position of the sidebar

props.name: color
props.description: The color variant of the sidebar

props.name: size
props.description: The size variant of the navbar
